prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a cute, round face and playful demeanor.
I want a Pokemon that combines soft purple hues with striking blue eyes.
Generate a small Pokemon with a whimsical design, featuring a unique head shape.
Make a character that embodies a gentle spirit, with a focus on psychic abilities.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing a mix of colors.
Design a tiny Pokemon that has a mischievous yet endearing personality.
Show me a whimsical creature that captures the essence of psychic powers in its appearance.
